problems.title: Reverse Words in a String
problems.description:
Reverse the order of words in a given string. Words are separated by spaces. Print the string with words reversed.

Input Format:
First line contains a string.

Output Format:
Print the string with words in reverse order.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
Hello World Java

Sample Output
Java World Hello

Sample Input
the sky is blue

Sample Output
blue is sky the

Explanation:
Reverse the order of words while keeping each word intact.
hintsList: Split string into words, reverse the array of words, then join them back with spaces.
